xyz.morphia.utils

Class ReflectionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.morphia.utils.ReflectionUtils

  • public final class ReflectionUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Various reflection utility methods, used mainly in the Mapper.
    Author:
    Olafur Gauti Gudmundsson

                                                        boolean mapSubPackages)
        Returns the classes in a package
        Parameters:
        packageName - the package to scan
        mapSubPackages - whether to map the sub-packages while scanning
        Returns:
        the list of classes

      • getClass

        public static java.lang.Class<?> getClass(java.lang.reflect.Type type)
        Get the underlying class for a type, or null if the type is a variable type.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the underlying class

      • getTypeArguments

        public static <T> java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>> getTypeArguments(java.lang.Class<T> baseClass,
                                                                      java.lang.Class<? extends T> childClass)
        Deprecated. this class is unused in morphia and will be removed in a future release
        Get the actual type arguments a child class has used to extend a generic base class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the base class
        Parameters:
        baseClass - the base class
        childClass - the child class
        Returns:
        a list of the raw classes for the actual type arguments.

      • isConcrete

        public static boolean isConcrete(java.lang.Class type)
        Parameters:
        type - the class to check
        Returns:
        true is the class is not a concrete type
